body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jack Williams and the customer's name is Katherine Gonzales.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Tech Solutions. My name is Emily. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Emily, I am having trouble with my laptop. It's running very slowly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. I can definitely help you with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Can you please provide me with your email address so I can look up your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. One more thing, may I have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five one two three four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. I have all the information I need. Let's get started on fixing your laptop. I appreciate your time today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Emily. I hope we can solve this issue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. We'll do our best. Have a great day!
